thread.title: Bieber 'named as suspect in assault investigation'
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber 'named as suspect in assault investigation' | Daily Mail Online

author: Justin Enriquez For Dailymail.com
title: Bieber 'named as suspect in assault investigation'
text:
Justin Bieber has been named as the suspect for allegedly assaulting a man back in June.
Video had surfaced at the time of the 22-year-old hitmaker getting into a shoving match with a man twice his size after a Cleveland Cavaliers NBA Finals basketball game.
Now law enforcement sources from the city told TMZ on Wednesday that Bieber is now the suspect of the incident.
Scroll down for video
Throwing hands: Justin Bieber has been named as the suspect for allegedly assaulting a man back in June, as this video surfaced just days after the incident
According to the site, the alleged victim told cops that the Purpose hitmaker had grabbed his sunglasses.
He then claims to have taken a photo of Bieber with the eyewear which allegedly set the singer off and into 'attack mode.'
The alleged victim claims that the Canadian singer's crew also got involved as the confrontation led him to multiple injuries including a concussion.
Altercation: Video had emerged showing Bieber getting into a shoving match with the man who is twice his size, before deciding to really push the envelope and throw a punch and as he was ultimately grabbed and taken to the ground
Back in June, a report from the same publication claimed that Bieber had started the fight with the fan named Lamont Richmond.
At the time, the 6ft5in man the pop star had picked a fight with spoke to TMZ as he claimed that Bieber had called him a 'motherf
